title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list do not appear in the File menu after restarting the session.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu after restarting.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the software and access some files.
2. Close the software.
3. Reopen the software and check the File menu MRU list.
